metadata.description: This data set includes 30 m cultivated land and construction land distribution products in Qilian Mountain Area in 2020. The product comes from the land cover classification product of 30 m in Qilian Mountain Area in 2020. The land cover classification products of 30m in 2020 areproduced using change detection method based on the land cover classification product of 2019 in Google Earth engine platform with the Landsat series data . The overall accuracy of the product is better than 85%. This product is a continuation of the human activity parameter product from 1985 to 2019，which also can be downloaded from this website.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包括祁连山区域2020年的30m耕地和建设用地分布产品。该产品来源于祁连山区域2020年30m的土地覆盖分类产品。2020年30m的土地覆盖分类产品以2019年的土地覆盖分类产品为基础，基于Google Earth Engine平台的Landsat系列数据和强大地数据处理能力，利用变化检测的思想和方法生产得到。产品的总精度优于85%。该产品是1985-2019年人类活动参数产品的延续。1985-2019年的人类活动参数产品也可在本网站下载得到。

background: Land-cover datasets are crucial for research on eco-hydrological processes and earth system modeling. Remote sensing has become widely used as a macro-observing system for land-cover mapping, which can substitute for plant functional type (PFT) as the baseline. Several moderate to fine resolution global land-cover datasets, which are presented in detail in Table I, based on different satellite sensors are available from different research groups. These land-cover datasets listed in Table I have large variability for three reasons: 1) the data quality and properties are different; 2) there is no standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories; and 3) they are not consistent with the Earth System Model’s (ESM) requirements, because the concept of PFT, whose traits represent a combination of spectral relationships, and climatic, ecological, and theoretical assumptions, used in ESMs cannot be mapped directly using remote-sensing land-cover datasets. In addition, the classification accuracies of land-cover datasets vary and are hardly suited for land-process modeling and applications at a river basin scale. The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover. For the HRB, most are distributed over an arid region, so the vegetation classification in the HRB based on current land-cover datasets would cause very large uncertainty and may cause great error or even the failure of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling.
research objective: In order to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling in the HRB, a comprehensive method for mapping monthly land cover with fine spatial resolution and more categories of crop/vegetation is developed by using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands.
challenges: The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover. For the HRB, most are distributed over an arid region, so the vegetation classification in the HRB based on current land-cover datasets would cause very large uncertainty and may cause great error or even the failure of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling.
methods: A mosaic of the HRB is made using Landsat/TM imagery. The mosaic of Landsat/TM is used as the base image and all HJ-1/CCD images are automatically corrected through the image-to-image registration method. Converting the DN values of the HJ-1/CCD images to top of atmosphere (TOA) radiance with given calibration coefficients. Removing the atmospheric effects of remote-sensing images to obtain the surface reflectance. After the preprocessing has been done, all the HJ-1/CCD images within 1 month are subset and mosaicked; consequently, 10 mosaics for 10 months in the HRB are made and time series of the HRB mosaics from HJ-1/CCD are constructed.
dataset: The HJ-1/CCD remote-sensing data used in this research were provided by the China Centre for Resources Satellite Data and Application (CRESDA, http://www.cresda.com). The Landsat TM/ETM+ data were downloaded from the USGS website (http://landsat.usgs.gov/). The MODIS data were downloaded from the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (http://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/). The VHSR data were from Google Earth by Google Inc.
findings: The confusion matrix is used to evaluate the classification accuracy, showing an overall classification accuracy of over 90% in the HRB, which is quite higher than previous approaches. Furthermore, a ground campaign was performed to evaluate the accuracy of crop classification and an overall accuracy of 84.09% for the crop classification was achieved.
backgroundCn: 土地覆盖数据集对于生态水文过程和地球系统建模的研究至关重要。遥感技术已广泛应用于土地覆盖制图，作为植物功能类型（PFT）的替代基线。根据不同的卫星传感器，多个中等到精细分辨率的全球土地覆盖数据集可供不同研究小组使用，这些数据集在表I中详细列出。这些土地覆盖数据集存在较大的变异性，原因有三：1）数据质量和属性不同；2）将连续的植被覆盖分类为离散类别没有标准方法；3）它们与地球系统模型（ESM）的要求不一致，因为ESM中使用的PFT概念，其特征代表了一系列光谱关系、气候、生态和理论假设的组合，无法直接通过遥感土地覆盖数据集进行映射。此外，土地覆盖数据集的分类准确性差异很大，难以适用于流域尺度的土地过程建模和应用。光学遥感影像中土地覆盖分类的不确定性最高，通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及干旱地区的灌木、草地和森林类别之间，因为森林覆盖所需的最小阈值存在差异。对于HRB，大部分分布在干旱地区，因此基于当前土地覆盖数据集的HRB植被分类将导致非常大的不确定性，并可能造成生态水文和土地过程建模的重大错误甚至失败。
research objectiveCn: 为了提高HRB地区生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，开发了一种综合方法，通过使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据，进行每月土地覆盖的细致空间分辨率和更多作物/植被类别的制图。
challengesCn: 光学遥感影像的土地覆盖分类中，最高的不确定性通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及在干旱地区的灌木、草地和森林类别之间，这主要是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异。在HRB（黄河流域），大多数地区分布在干旱区域，因此基于当前土地覆盖数据集的HRB植被分类将导致非常大的不确定性，并可能造成重大错误，甚至导致生态水文和土地过程建模的失败。
methodsCn: HRB的马赛克是使用Landsat/TM影像制作的。Landsat/TM的马赛克作为基础影像，所有HJ-1/CCD影像通过图像间配准方法自动校正。使用给定的校准系数将HJ-1/CCD影像的DN值转换为大气顶辐射（TOA）亮度。去除遥感影像的气象效应，以获得地表反射率。在完成预处理后，所有在1个月内的HJ-1/CCD影像被子集并拼接；因此，HRB在10个月内制作了10个马赛克，并构建了HJ-1/CCD的时间序列马赛克。
datasetCn: 本研究使用的HJ-1/CCD遥感数据由中国资源卫星数据与应用中心（CRESDA，http://www.cresda.com）提供。Landsat TM/ETM+数据从USGS网站（http://landsat.usgs.gov/）下载。MODIS数据从NASA戈达德太空飞行中心（http://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/）下载。VHSR数据来自谷歌公司（Google Inc.）的谷歌地球（Google Earth）。
findingsCn: 混淆矩阵用于评估分类准确性，HRB的整体分类准确率超过90%，这比之前的方法高得多。此外，进行了地面调查以评估作物分类的准确性，最终实现了84.09%的整体作物分类准确率。

background: Long time series of land cover changes (LCCs) are critical in the analysis of long-term climate, environmental, and ecological changes. Although several moderate to fine resolution global land cover datasets have been publicly released and they show strong consistency at the global scale, they have large deviations at the regional scale; furthermore, high-quality land cover datasets from before 2000 are not available and the classification consistency among different datasets is not very good. Remote sensing has become widely used for global land cover mapping, as it can capture the changes of land cover quickly. Until now, several moderate to fine resolution global land cover datasets have been publicly released and the spatial resolutions of these products are between 1 km and 30 m. They show strong consistency at the global scale, but they have large deviations at the regional scale. The main problems include: (1) most of the land cover datasets have a relatively low resolution (500 m and lower) and their accuracies are usually lower than 75%; among the released datasets, GlobeLand30 and FROM-GLC30 have a spatial resolution of 30 m, and their overall accuracies are 80% and 72% respectively; (2) the classification accuracy of these released datasets at the regional scale is much lower than the claimed accuracy, especially at heterogeneous areas, which is difficult to meet the modeling requirements, and (3) all the datasets are after 2000 and do not have long time series and therefore cannot support the analysis of long-term climate, environmental, and ecological changes.
research objective: Therefore, by taking the advantages of the two categories of satellite data, we proposed a new time series land cover mapping method based on machine learning and it, thereafter, is applied to Heihe River Basin (HRB) for verification purposes.
challenges: Many comprehensive classification methods, such as GlobeLand30 using Landsat series satellite data have been developed but the ones with high accuracy usually require manual intervention; thus, more than 10 years’ land cover maps with areas over 140,000 km2 do not allow a lot of manual intervention. Although methods based on time series analysis like LCMM have the capability for making high-quality land cover datasets, a 16-day revisiting period of Landsat series satellite data does not support constructing time series data at HRB. Although machine learning methods, such as FROM-GLC30 have a lot of advantages and have been employed to map land cover using remote sensing imagery, they are usually limited by sampling amount and representativity; the requirement for consistency on data of these methods cannot be met by Landsat series satellite data.
methods: Firstly, the high-quality land cover datasets at HRB from 2011–2015, which were retrieved using the LCMM method, are used for quickly and accurately making training samples. Secondly, a strategy for transferring the training samples after 2011 to earlier years is established. Thirdly, the random forest model is employed to train the selected yearly samples and a land cover map for every year is subsequently made. Finally, comprehensive analysis and validation are carried out for evaluation.
dataset: Firstly, the high-quality land cover datasets at HRB from 2011–2015, which were retrieved using the LCMM method, are used for quickly and accurately making training samples.
findings: In this study, a long time series land cover dataset including 1986, 1990, 1995, 2000, 2005, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, and 2015 is finally made and an average precision of about 90% is achieved. It is the longest time series land cover map with 30 m resolution at HRB and the dataset has good time continuity and stability.
backgroundCn: 长期的土地覆盖变化（LCCs）时间序列在分析长期气候、环境和生态变化中至关重要。尽管已经公开发布了几种中等到精细分辨率的全球土地覆盖数据集，并且它们在全球范围内显示出强一致性，但在区域尺度上存在较大偏差；此外，2000年之前的高质量土地覆盖数据集并不可用，不同数据集之间的分类一致性也不太好。遥感技术已被广泛用于全球土地覆盖制图，因为它能够快速捕捉土地覆盖的变化。到目前为止，已经公开发布了几种中等到精细分辨率的全球土地覆盖数据集，这些产品的空间分辨率在1公里到30米之间。它们在全球范围内显示出强一致性，但在区域尺度上存在较大偏差。主要问题包括：（1）大多数土地覆盖数据集的分辨率相对较低（500米及以下），其准确率通常低于75%；在发布的数据集中，GlobeLand30和FROM-GLC30的空间分辨率为30米，整体准确率分别为80%和72%；（2）这些发布的数据集在区域尺度上的分类准确率远低于声称的准确率，尤其是在异质区域，这难以满足建模要求；（3）所有数据集均为2000年之后的数据，缺乏长期时间序列，因此无法支持长期气候、环境和生态变化的分析。
research objectiveCn: 因此，通过利用这两类卫星数据的优势，我们提出了一种基于机器学习的新型时间序列土地覆盖制图方法，并随后将其应用于黑河流域（HRB）进行验证。
challengesCn: 许多综合分类方法，如使用Landsat系列卫星数据的GlobeLand30，已经被开发出来，但高准确度的方法通常需要人工干预；因此，超过140,000平方公里的土地覆盖图在过去10年中并不允许大量的人工干预。尽管基于时间序列分析的方法，如LCMM，具有制作高质量土地覆盖数据集的能力，但Landsat系列卫星数据的16天重访周期并不支持在HRB构建时间序列数据。虽然机器学习方法，如FROM-GLC30，具有许多优点并已被用于利用遥感影像绘制土地覆盖图，但它们通常受到样本数量和代表性的限制；这些方法对数据一致性的要求无法通过Landsat系列卫星数据来满足。
methodsCn: 首先，使用LCMM方法获取的2011年至2015年的高质量土地覆盖数据集被用于快速准确地制作训练样本。其次，建立了一种将2011年后的训练样本转移到早期年份的策略。第三，采用随机森林模型对选定的年度样本进行训练，并随后制作每一年的土地覆盖图。最后，进行全面分析和验证以进行评估。
datasetCn: 首先，2011年至2015年期间通过LCMM方法获取的高质量土地覆盖数据集被用于快速准确地制作训练样本。
findingsCn: 在这项研究中，最终制作了一个包含1986、1990、1995、2000、2005、2010、2011、2012、2013、2014和2015年的长期时间序列土地覆盖数据集，平均精度达到约90%。这是HRB地区分辨率为30米的最长时间序列土地覆盖图，该数据集具有良好的时间连续性和稳定性。

background: It is very difficult to have remote sensing data with both high spatial resolution and high temporal frequency; thus, two categories of land-use mapping methodology have been developed separately for coarser resolution and finer resolution data. Land use and land cover are the key factors for understanding the interactions between global changes and human activities, such as social, economic, and cultural activities. Moreover, it is one of the key parameters of land process modeling, and more accurate land use and land cover data will improve the accuracy of ecological, hydrological, and atmospheric models. Consequently, land use and land cover data are now widely used in many kinds of researches, such as biodiversity, carbon cycle, public health, crop yield estimation, urban sprawl, forest monitoring, and so on. Since land cover/use can be retrieved straightforwardly from remote sensing, many land cover/use mapping methods using remotely sensed data have been developed for the purposes of regional or global applications.
research objective: Therefore, by taking the spatiotemporal advantage of HJ-1/CCD data we propose a new method for finer resolution land cover mapping using the time series HJ-1/CCD data, which can greatly improve the land cover mapping accuracy.
challenges: This method uses much more data and dramatically increases the computation loading; the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data lower its usability and increase the difficulty in its use.
methods: In our two study areas, the very high resolution remote sensing data within Google Earth are used to validate the land cover mapping results, which shows a very high mapping accuracy of 95.76% and 83.78% and a high Kappa coefficient of 0.9423 and 0.8165 in the Dahuofang area of Liaoning Province and the Heiquan area of Gansu Province respectively.
dataset: The HJ-1 satellite constellation consists of three satellites, named as HJ-1A, HJ-1B, and HJ-1C respectively. For CCD cameras, their nominal spatial resolution is 30 m. HJ-1/CCDs have three visible bands (430–520 nm, 520–600 nm, and 630–690 nm) and one near-infrared band (760–900 nm). The time series data are composed of one dataset per month, so this time series of data can depict the variation of typical land surface.
findings: The overall accuracy for classification result using the time series of HJ-1/CCD data is 96.76% and the Kappa coefficient is 0.9423; the corresponding overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient for classification result using single Hj-1/CCD data are 87.59% and 0.8296 respectively. Compared with the classification result from single Hj-1/CCD data, the overall accuracy of classification result using the time series HJ-1/CCD data is more than 10% and the Kappa coefficient is more than 0.1. The overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient of classification result using the time series HJ-1/CCD data are 83.78% and 0.8165 respectively; those using single HJ-1/CCD data are 70.82% and 0.665 respectively. It is similar to the comparison in the Dahuofang area that the overall accuracy of classification result using the time series HJ-1/CCD data is also 10% higher and Kappa coefficient is also 0.1 higher than that of classification result using single HJ-1/CCD data.
backgroundCn: 遥感数据同时具备高空间分辨率和高时间频率是非常困难的，因此针对较粗分辨率和较细分辨率数据分别开发了两类土地利用制图方法。土地利用和土地覆盖是理解全球变化与人类活动（如社会、经济和文化活动）之间相互作用的关键因素。此外，它们是土地过程建模的关键参数，更准确的土地利用和土地覆盖数据将提高生态、水文和大气模型的准确性。因此，土地利用和土地覆盖数据现在广泛应用于多种研究，如生物多样性、碳循环、公共健康、作物产量估计、城市扩张、森林监测等。由于土地覆盖/利用可以直接从遥感中获取，因此已经开发了许多利用遥感数据进行土地覆盖/利用制图的方法，以满足区域或全球应用的需要。
research objectiveCn: 因此，通过利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势，我们提出了一种新的方法，利用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行更精细的土地覆盖制图，这可以大大提高土地覆盖制图的准确性。
challengesCn: 该方法使用了更多的数据，并显著增加了计算负载；HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳降低了其可用性，并增加了使用上的难度。
methodsCn: 在我们的两个研究区域，使用Google Earth中的超高分辨率遥感数据来验证土地覆盖制图结果，显示出大连高的制图准确率，分别为95.76%和83.78%，以及高Kappa系数，分别为0.9423和0.8165，分别在辽宁省的大伙房地区和甘肃省的黑泉地区。
datasetCn: HJ-1卫星星座由三颗卫星组成，分别命名为HJ-1A、HJ-1B和HJ-1C。其CCD相机的标称空间分辨率为30米。HJ-1/CCD具有三个可见光波段（430–520纳米、520–600纳米和630–690纳米）和一个近红外波段（760–900纳米）。时间序列数据由每月一个数据集组成，因此这组时间序列数据可以描绘典型地表的变化。
findingsCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据的时间序列进行分类的总体准确率为96.76%，Kappa系数为0.9423；而使用单一HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果的总体准确率和Kappa系数分别为87.59%和0.8296。与单一HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果相比，使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果的总体准确率提高了10%以上，Kappa系数提高了0.1以上。使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果的总体准确率和Kappa系数分别为83.78%和0.8165；而使用单一HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果的总体准确率和Kappa系数分别为70.82%和0.665。在大伙房地区的比较中，使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果的总体准确率也比单一HJ-1/CCD数据的分类结果高出10%，Kappa系数也高出0.1。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the use of Landsat series data enable the production of land-cover datasets with an accuracy greater than 85%?
Verification.QuestionCn: 使用Landsat系列数据是否能够生成准确度超过85%的土地覆盖数据集？

Verification.QuestionEn: Can machine learning methods using remote sensing data be limited by sampling amount and representativity?
Verification.QuestionCn: 使用遥感数据的机器学习方法是否会受到样本数量和代表性的限制？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is there a challenge in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery between cropland and grassland categories due to differences in the minimum threshold for forest cover?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在光学遥感影像的土地覆盖分类中，由于森林覆盖的最低阈值差异，农田和草地类别之间存在挑战。

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Do the challenges in land-cover classification primarily stem from the resolution of the data, the classification method, or the variability in vegetation types?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 土地覆盖分类中的挑战主要源于数据的分辨率、分类方法还是植被类型的变异性？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main challenges in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 从光学遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类的主要挑战是什么？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: uncertainty between cropland and grassland, dryland systems among shrub, grassland, and forest categories
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 农田和草地之间的不确定性，旱地系统在灌木、草地和森林类别之间的差异。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where can datasets for remote sensing land-cover mapping be sourced?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 可以从哪里获取用于遥感土地覆盖制图的数据集？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: China Centre for Resources Satellite Data and Application, USGS, NASA Goddard Space Flight Center, Google Earth
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 中国资源卫星应用中心，美国地质调查局，NASA戈达德太空飞行中心，谷歌地球

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What methods are used to improve land-cover mapping accuracy in the Heihe River Basin?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在黑河流域，提高土地覆盖制图精度的方法有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Landsat/TM imagery, automatic image-to-image registration correction, DN values to TOA radiance conversion, atmospheric effects removal, HJ-1/CCD mosaics time series
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: Landsat/TM影像，自动影像配准校正，DN值到TOA辐射率转换，大气效应去除，HJ-1/CCD镶嵌时间序列

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in land-cover classification using remote sensing imagery, particularly in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 在使用遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类时，特别是在干旱地区，面临的一个挑战是影像中的光谱混叠现象。
Example.AnswerEn: The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover. For the HRB, most are distributed over an arid region, so the vegetation classification based on current land-cover datasets would cause very large uncertainty.
Example.AnswerCn: 光学遥感影像中的土地覆盖分类的不确定性最高，通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及在干旱地区的灌木、草地和森林类别之间，这主要是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异。在HRB地区，大部分分布在干旱区域，因此基于当前土地覆盖数据集的植被分类会导致非常大的不确定性。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset used for training samples in the mapping of long-term land cover changes?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于训练样本的数据集示例，以便映射长期土地覆盖变化？
Example.AnswerEn: The high-quality land cover datasets at HRB from 2011–2015, retrieved using the LCMM method, are used for quickly and accurately making training samples for long-term land cover changes.
Example.AnswerCn: 2011年至2015年期间，通过LCMM方法获取的高质量土地覆盖数据集在HRB被用于快速准确地制作长期土地覆盖变化的训练样本。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the properties and challenges associated with land-cover classification using remotely sensed imagery in arid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用遥感影像在干旱地区进行土地覆盖分类的属性和挑战是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: high uncertainty, significant errors, failure of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 高不确定性，显著错误，生态水文和土地过程建模失败

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of time series land cover datasets and their implications for modeling long-term ecological changes?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 时间序列土地覆盖数据集的特征及其对长期生态变化建模的影响。
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: long duration, fine spatial resolution (30 m), good time continuity, stability, average precision of about 90%
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 长时间持续，精细空间分辨率（30米），良好的时间连续性，稳定性，平均精度约为90%

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the features of using HJ-1/CCD time series data for land cover mapping and how do they impact the accuracy of classification results?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD时间序列数据进行土地覆盖制图的特点是什么，以及这些特点如何影响分类结果的准确性？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 96.76% overall accuracy, Kappa coefficient of 0.9423, spatiotemporal advantages, increased computational load, challenges in geometric and radiometric quality
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 整体准确率为96.76%，Kappa系数为0.9423，时空优势，计算负担增加，几何和辐射质量的挑战。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the overall accuracy percentage of land cover classification using time series HJ-1/CCD data?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 使用时序HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖分类的整体准确率百分比是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many years are included in the long time series land cover dataset created for the Heihe River Basin (HRB)?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 为黑河流域（HRB）创建的长期系列土地覆盖数据集包含多少年？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the claimed total accuracy percentage of the cropland classification achieved through ground campaigns?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 通过地面调查实现的农田分类的声称总准确率百分比是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'land-cover datasets' in the context of eco-hydrological processes and earth system modeling?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生态水文过程和地球系统建模的背景下，“土地覆盖数据集”是指用于描述地球表面不同类型土地覆盖（如森林、草地、城市、农田等）的数据集合。这些数据集对于理解和模拟生态系统的功能、水文循环以及人类活动对环境的影响至关重要。
Definition.AnswerEn: Land-cover datasets refer to spatial data that represent the distribution of different types of land cover such as forests, croplands, grasslands, and urban areas. These datasets are crucial for eco-hydrological processes and earth system modeling as they provide baseline information for mapping and analyzing land cover changes using remote sensing technologies. They often involve categorizing continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories to support modeling requirements.
Definition.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖数据集是指表示不同类型土地覆盖分布的空间数据，例如森林、农田、草地和城市区域。这些数据集对于生态水文过程和地球系统建模至关重要，因为它们提供了使用遥感技术进行土地覆盖变化映射和分析的基础信息。它们通常涉及将连续的植被覆盖分类为离散类别，以支持建模需求。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'classification accuracy' mean concerning land-cover datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: “分类准确率”在土地覆盖数据集中的含义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Classification accuracy in relation to land-cover datasets refers to the degree to which the dataset correctly identifies and categorizes different land cover types. It is often evaluated using a confusion matrix or through ground truthing methods. High classification accuracy is critical for ensuring that the dataset is reliable for modeling and research purposes, and it varies depending on the methods used and the quality of the remote sensing data.
Definition.AnswerCn: 分类准确度与土地覆盖数据集相关，指的是数据集正确识别和分类不同土地覆盖类型的程度。通常通过混淆矩阵或实地验证方法进行评估。高分类准确度对于确保数据集在建模和研究目的上的可靠性至关重要，并且它会根据所使用的方法和遥感数据的质量而有所不同。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods using Landsat series satellite data compare to those using HJ-1/CCD data in terms of classification accuracy and resolution for land-cover mapping?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用Landsat系列卫星数据的资料收集方法与使用HJ-1/CCD数据的方法在土地覆盖制图的分类精度和分辨率方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Landsat series satellite data are used in various land-cover mapping methods, presenting challenges such as lower resolution and difficulties in constructing time series data at regional scales. In contrast, HJ-1/CCD data, despite having issues with geometric and radiometric qualities, offer finer resolution and higher classification accuracy when used in time series compared to single data instances.
Comparison.AnswerCn: Landsat系列卫星数据在各种土地覆盖制图方法中被使用，但面临着分辨率较低和在区域尺度上构建时间序列数据的困难。相比之下，HJ-1/CCD数据尽管在几何和辐射质量上存在问题，但在时间序列中使用时提供了更细的分辨率和更高的分类准确性，而单一数据实例则不具备这一优势。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in classification challenges faced when using optical remotely sensed imagery in arid regions compared to heterogeneous areas?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区使用光学遥感影像时，与异质区域相比，面临的分类挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In arid regions, the highest uncertainty in classification occurs between categories like cropland and grassland due to thresholds for forest cover. In heterogeneous areas, the classification accuracy is much lower than claimed, especially with datasets at lower resolutions, complicating land-process modeling.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，分类中最高的不确定性发生在农田和草地等类别之间，这与森林覆盖的阈值有关。在异质区域，分类准确性远低于声称的水平，尤其是在低分辨率的数据集上，这使得土地过程建模变得复杂。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What similarities exist in the use of machine learning methods for land cover mapping in both Heihe River Basin and broader global applications?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在黑河流域和更广泛的全球应用中，机器学习方法在土地覆盖制图中的使用存在哪些相似之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Machine learning methods, like those applied in the Heihe River Basin, are utilized globally for land cover mapping, benefiting from high-quality land cover datasets and offering high accuracy. Both applications face challenges such as the need for consistency and representative sampling, though they provide improved resolution and enable long-term series analysis.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 机器学习方法，如在黑河流域应用的那些，全球范围内用于土地覆盖制图，受益于高质量的土地覆盖数据集，并提供高精度。这些应用面临着一致性和代表性抽样的挑战，尽管如此，它们提供了更高的分辨率，并能够进行长期系列分析。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges can arise when using remote sensing data for land cover classification, and how might these challenges affect the accuracy and usability of the resulting datasets?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用遥感数据进行土地覆盖分类时可能会出现哪些挑战，这些挑战如何影响最终数据集的准确性和可用性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in using remote sensing data for land cover classification include high uncertainty in distinguishing between categories such as cropland and grassland, especially in arid regions. These challenges can lead to large uncertainties and errors in land-process modeling, affecting the accuracy and usability of datasets for eco-hydrological studies.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用遥感数据进行土地覆盖分类的挑战包括在干旱地区区分农田和草地等类别时存在较高的不确定性。这些挑战可能导致土地过程建模中的大规模不确定性和错误，从而影响生态水文研究中数据集的准确性和可用性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can time series analysis of data improve the consistency and accuracy of land cover datasets, and what might be the benefits of this approach for long-term environmental and ecological studies?
Interpretation.QuestionCn:
时间序列分析数据可以通过以下方式提高土地覆盖数据集的一致性和准确性，并且这种方法对长期环境和生态研究的好处是什么：

时间序列分析可以通过监测土地覆盖变化的动态趋势，识别季节性模式和异常值，从而提高数据的一致性和准确性。通过对不同时间点的数据进行比较，可以更好地理解土地利用变化的驱动因素，并减少由于单一时间点数据引起的误差。此外，时间序列分析还可以帮助填补数据缺口，提供更全面的土地覆盖信息。

这种方法对长期环境和生态研究的好处包括：能够更准确地评估生态系统的变化，支持可持续土地管理决策，增强对气候变化影响的理解，以及为生物多样性保护提供科学依据。通过长期监测，研究人员可以识别出长期趋势和潜在的环境风险，从而制定更有效的保护和恢复策略。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Time series analysis can improve the consistency and accuracy of land cover datasets by providing a more comprehensive understanding of land cover changes over time. This approach supports the development of high-quality datasets with good temporal continuity, which are beneficial for analyzing long-term environmental and ecological changes, contributing to more accurate modeling and predictions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 时间序列分析可以通过提供对土地覆盖变化的更全面理解来提高土地覆盖数据集的一致性和准确性。这种方法支持高质量数据集的开发，具有良好的时间连续性，这对分析长期环境和生态变化非常有益，有助于更准确的建模和预测。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the variability and uncertainty in land-cover classification when using remotely sensed imagery?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在使用遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类时，导致变异性和不确定性的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The variability and uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery primarily arise due to differences in data quality, the lack of a standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories, and inconsistencies with Earth System Model requirements. High uncertainty is particularly noted between cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems due to the minimum threshold required for forest cover.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 光学遥感影像的土地覆盖分类中的变异性和不确定性主要源于数据质量的差异、将连续植被覆盖分类为离散类别的标准方法缺乏，以及与地球系统模型要求的不一致性。特别是在农田和草地类别之间以及干旱地区，由于对森林覆盖的最低阈值要求，存在较高的不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why do high-quality land-cover datasets before 2000 have limited availability and inconsistency?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么2000年前的高质量土地覆盖数据集可用性有限且不一致？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: High-quality land-cover datasets before 2000 are limited and inconsistent due to the absence of high-resolution data and the challenges in achieving classification consistency among different datasets. Additionally, most available datasets have relatively low resolution and their accuracies are significantly lower at regional scales, particularly in heterogeneous areas. This complicates the ability to support long-term climate, environmental, and ecological change analysis.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 2000年前的高质量土地覆盖数据集有限且不一致，主要由于缺乏高分辨率数据以及在不同数据集之间实现分类一致性的挑战。此外，大多数可用数据集的分辨率相对较低，尤其是在异质区域，其准确性显著降低。这使得支持长期气候、环境和生态变化分析变得复杂。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the computational load to increase significantly when using finer resolution data for land-cover mapping?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用更细分辨率数据进行土地覆盖制图时，计算负荷显著增加的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The computational load increases significantly when using finer resolution data for land-cover mapping because such methods involve processing a much larger volume of data, which demands more resources. Furthermore, the geometric and radiometric quality of the data, such as that from HJ-1/CCD, can be suboptimal, which adds to the complexity and difficulty in using the data effectively.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用更细分辨率的数据进行土地覆盖制图时，计算负荷显著增加，因为这类方法涉及处理更大体积的数据，需求更多资源。此外，数据的几何和辐射质量，例如来自HJ-1/CCD的数据，可能不尽如人意，这增加了有效使用数据的复杂性和难度。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to develop a comprehensive method for mapping monthly land cover with fine spatial resolution and more categories of crop/vegetation?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发一种全面的方法来以细致的空间分辨率和更多的作物/植被类别绘制月度土地覆盖图是重要的，原因如下：
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling, particularly in arid regions like the Heihe River Basin (HRB), where current land-cover datasets cause significant uncertainty and modeling errors.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是提高生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，特别是在像黑河流域（HRB）这样的干旱地区，目前的土地覆盖数据集导致了显著的不确定性和建模错误。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to use time series HJ-1/CCD data for finer resolution land cover mapping?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行更精细的土地覆盖制图是必要的？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intention is to leverage the spatiotemporal advantages of HJ-1/CCD data to significantly enhance land cover mapping accuracy, which is crucial for improving ecological, hydrological, and atmospheric modeling.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目的是利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势显著提高土地覆盖制图的准确性，这对改善生态、水文和大气模型至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the instrumental steps involved in preprocessing remote sensing images to obtain surface reflectance for land cover classification?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 获取地表反射率以进行土地覆盖分类的遥感图像预处理的步骤包括以下几个方面：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To preprocess remote sensing images for obtaining surface reflectance, the steps include using a base image like Landsat/TM for image-to-image registration correction of HJ-1/CCD images, converting DN values to top of atmosphere (TOA) radiance using calibration coefficients, and removing atmospheric effects to obtain surface reflectance.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了预处理遥感图像以获取表面反射率，步骤包括使用基础图像如Landsat/TM对HJ-1/CCD图像进行图像配准校正，将DN值转换为大气顶辐射（TOA）辐射，最后去除大气效应以获得表面反射率。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data be utilized to improve the accuracy of land cover mapping at fine spatial resolutions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何利用多种分类器和多源遥感数据来提高细分辨率土地覆盖制图的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data can be used by constructing mosaics from datasets like Landsat/TM and HJ-1/CCD, applying the image-to-image registration method, and processing data with varying spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands to map monthly land cover with more categories of crop/vegetation.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 可以通过构建来自Landsat/TM和HJ-1/CCD等数据集的马赛克，应用图像配准方法，使用多种空间-时间分辨率和光谱波段的数据，利用多种分类器和多源遥感数据来绘制每月的土地覆盖图，并增加作物/植被的分类类别。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural approach is recommended for generating training samples for land cover datasets and transferring them across different time periods to ensure consistency in land cover mapping?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 推荐的程序方法是生成土地覆盖数据集的训练样本，并在不同时间段之间进行转移，以确保土地覆盖制图的一致性。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: A procedural approach involves using high-quality land cover datasets to quickly create training samples, establishing a strategy to transfer these samples to other time periods, employing a model like random forest to train yearly samples, and producing consistent land cover maps for each year.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 程序化方法涉及使用高质量的土地覆盖数据集快速创建训练样本，建立将这些样本转移到其他时间段的策略，采用随机森林等模型训练年度样本，并为每一年生成一致的土地覆盖地图。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements have enabled the use of multisource remotely sensed data for high-resolution land cover mapping in arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在干旱地区使用多源遥感数据进行高分辨率土地覆盖制图成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of platforms such as Google Earth Engine, which combines Landsat series data with powerful data processing capabilities, enables high-resolution land cover mapping by leveraging multisource remotely sensed data. This allows for effective change detection and classification in regions like the Heihe River Basin (HRB).
Enablement.AnswerCn: 使用像Google Earth Engine这样的平台，结合Landsat系列数据和强大的数据处理能力，可以通过利用多源遥感数据实现高分辨率的土地覆盖制图。这使得在像黑河流域（HRB）这样的地区进行有效的变化检测和分类成为可能。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of multiple classifiers enhance the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling in complex ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 多个分类器的集成如何提高复杂生态系统中生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Incorporating multiple classifiers with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands improves land cover mapping accuracy by addressing uncertainties in classification, particularly in complex ecosystems like the HRB, where discrepancies in vegetation types and cover thresholds pose challenges.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 结合具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多种分类器可以提高土地覆盖制图的准确性，通过解决分类中的不确定性，特别是在像HRB这样的复杂生态系统中，植被类型和覆盖阈值的差异带来了挑战。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or methodologies enable the creation of long time series land cover datasets with high precision?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些条件或方法论能够实现高精度的长期土地覆盖数据集的创建？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The creation of long time series land cover datasets with high precision is enabled by using machine learning methods, such as the random forest model, which allows for robust training and classification of yearly samples. This approach, combined with strategies for transferring training samples across years, supports the development of consistent datasets with good time continuity and stability.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 利用机器学习方法，如随机森林模型，可以创建高精度的长期土地覆盖数据集。这种方法允许对年度样本进行稳健的训练和分类。结合跨年度转移训练样本的策略，支持开发具有良好时间连续性和稳定性的一致数据集。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges are expected when attempting to classify cropland and grassland categories using remotely sensed imagery?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在尝试使用遥感影像对农田和草地类别进行分类时，预计会面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories due to differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover. This challenge is exacerbated in arid regions where vegetation classification can be particularly difficult, leading to large uncertainties in classification results.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 光学遥感影像中的土地覆盖分类最高的不确定性通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，这主要是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异。在干旱地区，这一挑战更加严重，植被分类尤其困难，导致分类结果的不确定性较大。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential limitations in using time series data from satellites like HJ-1/CCD for land-cover mapping in heterogeneous landscapes?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 使用像HJ-1/CCD这样的卫星时间序列数据进行异质景观的土地覆盖制图可能存在的潜在限制包括：
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The potential limitations in using time series data from satellites like HJ-1/CCD for land-cover mapping in heterogeneous landscapes include increased computational demands due to large data volumes and the need for high geometric and radiometric quality. Despite these challenges, the use of time-series data has been shown to significantly improve mapping accuracy, as seen in studies achieving accuracies of over 95% in some areas. However, the usability of HJ-1/CCD data can be limited by its not very good geometric and radiometric qualities, which can affect classification accuracy in heterogeneous landscapes.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用像HJ-1/CCD这样的卫星时间序列数据进行异质景观的土地覆盖制图存在潜在的局限性，包括由于数据量大而导致的计算需求增加，以及对高几何和辐射质量的需求。尽管面临这些挑战，时间序列数据的使用已被证明显著提高了制图准确性，某些地区的研究准确率超过95%。然而，HJ-1/CCD数据的可用性可能受到其几何和辐射质量不佳的限制，这可能影响异质景观中的分类准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how remote sensing data can be effectively used to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological models in arid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白遥感数据如何有效地用于提高干旱地区生态水文模型的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Remote sensing data can improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological models in arid regions by using multiple classifiers and multisource data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands. These datasets can provide fine spatial resolution and more detailed categories of vegetation, addressing uncertainties in land-cover classification, especially in cropland and grassland categories.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 遥感数据可以通过使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源数据，提高干旱地区生态水文模型的准确性。这些数据集可以提供细致的空间分辨率和更详细的植被分类，从而解决土地覆盖分类中的不确定性，特别是在农田和草地类别中。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the advantages of using time series data in land cover mapping methodologies.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在土地覆盖制图方法中使用时间序列数据的优势感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Time series data in land cover mapping methodologies allow for a more accurate depiction of land surface variations over time. This approach has been shown to significantly improve classification accuracies, as seen with HJ-1/CCD data, where the overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient were notably higher compared to single dataset usage.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 时间序列数据在土地覆盖制图方法中能够更准确地描绘土地表面随时间的变化。这种方法已被证明显著提高了分类准确性，例如使用HJ-1/CCD数据时，整体准确率和Kappa系数明显高于单一数据集的使用。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please provide an overview of data collection methods that enhance the accuracy of eco-hydrological modeling in river basins.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 提供增强河流流域生态水文模型准确性的数据显示收集方法概述。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Data collection methods that enhance eco-hydrological modeling accuracy in river basins involve using high-quality remote sensing data such as HJ-1/CCD and Landsat TM/ETM+ images. These images undergo preprocessing steps like radiometric correction and atmospheric effect removal to obtain surface reflectance. Time series mosaics are then created to improve classification accuracy. Furthermore, integrating data from multiple sources like MODIS and VHSR can provide comprehensive datasets to support accurate modeling.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 增强河流流域生态水文模型准确性的资料收集方法包括使用高质量的遥感数据，如HJ-1/CCD和Landsat TM/ETM+影像。这些影像经过辐射校正和大气效应去除等预处理步骤，以获得表面反射率。然后创建时间序列镶嵌图，以提高分类准确性。此外，整合来自多个来源的数据，如MODIS和VHSR，可以提供全面的数据集，以支持准确的建模。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please discuss potential strategies for developing long time series land cover datasets with high spatial resolution and their application in environmental modeling.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 讨论开发高空间分辨率的长期土地覆盖数据集的潜在策略及其在环境建模中的应用。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Developing long time series land cover datasets with high spatial resolution involves utilizing machine learning methods and satellite data like Landsat and HJ-1/CCD. A strategy includes using high-quality datasets from recent years to create training samples, transferring these samples to earlier years, and training models like random forests for annual land cover mapping. This approach can create datasets with good time continuity and stability, which are crucial for accurate environmental modeling and analysis of long-term climate and ecological changes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 开发高空间分辨率的长期土地覆盖数据集涉及利用机器学习方法和卫星数据，如Landsat和HJ-1/CCD。一种策略是使用近年来的高质量数据集来创建训练样本，将这些样本转移到早期年份，并训练随机森林等模型进行年度土地覆盖制图。这种方法可以创建具有良好时间连续性和稳定性的数据集，这对于准确的环境建模和长期气候及生态变化分析至关重要。
